item.title: Download Live CD/USB
item.description:
Custom Debian i3 workspace environment with additional software focus on high-performance application containers and artificial intelligence.

Stand Alone Complex

Nonsense systems have been reported to run on Debian, Ubuntu and CentOS.

You can use LuaRocks to install the nonsense pkg on Linux.

luarocks install pkg
